alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and central Clay Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middleburg to 10 miles southwest of Green Cove Springs to George`s Lake. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, Hastings, Middleburg, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, George`s Lake, Vilano Beach, Picolata and Bostwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
